snippet.title: Maiden & Spell Trailer
snippet.description:
RELEASING FEBRUARY 25TH!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1004770/Maiden_and_Spell/

Or find it on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/maidenspell/399676
Or itch.io: https://mino-dev.itch.io/maidenandspelldemo

Website:
https://www.maidenspellgame.com

Discord:
https://discord.gg/mns

Mailing List: https://mailchi.mp/2516536f5292/mino_dev
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mino_dev
Press Kit: https://www.maidenspellgame.com/press-kit

Maiden & Spell is a one-on-one magical girl aerial projectile battler, featuring a colorful cast of ladies fighting with fantastic spells.

Battling with magic is simple! Fire your spells, hit your opponent, and don't get hit yourself! Each maiden is color-coded and has a set of abilities unique to them, activated at a press of a button. There aren't any complicated combos or intricate inputs or grabs or melee attacks or block buttons! Just a 3-pixels-wide hitbox, a lot of shiny bullets, and your own dodging skills.

You can fight against a friend in Versus Mode, or test your skill against a series of opponents and bullet hell boss attacks in Story Mode.

And yes, it will have online play, with rollback netcode!
An open online beta is planned for the weekend of FEBRUARY 8TH!

Join the Discord or sign up for the mailing list for more info!!
